articles.content: Amazon Data Services India has acquired a 54-acre parcel in Thane, near Mumbai, from real estate developer Kalpataru Group for over Rs 1,870 crore in one of the largest outright land purchases this y… [+3252 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Meta’s $677 billion rout boots it out of world’s top 20 stocks - Economic Times
articles.description: Meta was the sixth biggest US company by market capitalization at the start of the year, flirting with a $1 trillion market value. Fast forward 10 months and the stock will be worth about $258 billion, ranking it 26th. Its market value is now smaller than com…
articles.content: Meta Platforms Inc. shareholders are paying dearly for its spending on the metaverse: The Facebook parents market value has collapsed by a whopping $677 billion this year, forcing it out from the ran… [+2407 chars]
